# Load Packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

# Import Dataset
```{r}
DistanceFromSurface_Data <-
readr::read_csv("Elder_RockRose_11June2018_Part1.csv", skip = 2,
                  col_names = c("objects", "events", "timecode", "time_sec", "X", "Y", "Z", "PLD_error", "re_projection_error", "nearest_camera_distance"))
DistanceFromSurface_Data
```
# Clean the Data
```{r}
CleanDFS_Data <- DistanceFromSurface_Data %>%
  arrange(objects, time_sec) %>%
  select(objects, events, time_sec, X, Y, Z) %>%
  filter(!grepl("^Length.*", events)) %>%
  group_by(objects) %>%
  summarise(mean = mean(Z))
CleanDFS_Data 
ggplot(CleanDFS_Data, aes(objects, mean)) + geom_point() + geom_hline(yintercept = 45.94) 
```
